extendedInfo.description: DESIGN YOUR LOVELY Cake Town! Have you ever wanted to design and decorate your own Cake Town? Now you can in Cake Town designer.Become a superstar designer as you decorate and expand your Cake Town! Customize every element of your Cake Town: furniture,decor, food,toy and more. Increase your Cake Town's value and collect income in Cake Town designer.Cake Town - CARTOON STYLE Incredible! Nearly 200 cartoon style items to customize your Cake Town with! You are the princess and it is your Cake Town.FEATURES:- Hundreds of stylish items to customize your villa.- Four types of Cake Town to be designed.- Sell your creation to get more cash.- Intuitive and easy to play for all ages.- Share your home with your friends over Facebook- Play with families--Have more fun.KEYWORDS:Decoration, Design, Customize, casual, entertainment, fun, free, jewelry, create

reviews.title: Perf
reviews.comment: Luv it so much i cant explain

reviews.title: Best game
reviews.comment: Simply fantastic game you won\'t regret like most games.!!!!!!!$

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Its better than a lot of games because you  don\'t need to worry about paying the furniture and stuff also you can make your own world and be the king or queen

reviews.title: I love it
reviews.comment: Wow Sweet
reviews.author: Ashley Cruz

reviews.comment: Love it!
reviews.author: Angelia Napitupulu

reviews.title: Game bribes you for 5 stars
reviews.comment: I doubt this game deserves 5 stars simply because they bribe you with a full version if you rate it 5. Shady tactics. :(  Why not just allow honest opinions? Do they think it\'s so crappy it won\'t get 5 stars on it\'s own merits? Sad...
reviews.author: Gwaendylan Fritz

reviews.title: very cute
reviews.comment: You must play this game , especially for the girls. Wooww very cute town like a fairytale.
reviews.author: Silvia Kurniawan

reviews.title: Okay
reviews.comment: Makes you rate it in order to unlock a bunch of things. So fine, I\'m rating it. Hopefully this isn\'t a sheisty game.
reviews.author: Leandra Santiago

reviews.title: EXCELLENT
reviews.comment: This is an awesome game. Its fun its setting up a sugary delicious town. Its just fun.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: It is good but its really boring when you don\'t have enough resources when you want to make something nd is really tiring straightening roads but its a  stress minus machine :-)
reviews.author: pearl hiraga

reviews.title: So cute and fun!  I just love the teensy cake houses.
reviews.comment: Love iiiitttttt!
reviews.author: Hannah Myers

reviews.title: Design a picture of a sweet village.
reviews.comment: It\'s pretty cool but it would be way better if it was more like the smurf village and you could do missions, set goals, design the inside of your house and even talk to friends by having a profile. I change my mind it\'s terrible, it said if I rate it I can get the full version for free but when I tried to open the app after rating it it just took me straight to the Google play store home. What a ripoff! I only put five stars to see if it would let me open it.
reviews.author: Amber Cloyd

reviews.title: 5* Bribery right here!  :(
reviews.comment: I\'m only rating this 5 stars to get the full version for free to try it out.  I reserve the right to ammend my rating as I see fit!  \343\200\212Insert Angry Face Here\343\200\213
